attributes.action: Increase the VAT Registration Threshold to £100,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would help:

    * Small businesses to remain competitive
    * Reduce admin burden of vat e.g. returns, pricing etc
    * Benefits of non vat inclusive price passed onto the consumer
    * Very easy to implement – no system changes or re-pricing on shop shelves

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the VAT Registration Threshold to £100,000"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22171


Prime Minister's Office
